titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1326) to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for additional funds to Community and Migrant Health Centers for the purpose of reducing the incidence of infant mortality.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-422.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/5/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1326 (community and migrant health centers).
